column4: if i want to upgrade from dapper to edgy to feisty is it ok to use the feisty dvd after the edgy 700mb install cd? and also what is the benefit of the dvd install?
why would you wanna do all that upgrading? why not just do a fresh install?
id like to keep my settings and programs, ive backed some up but im worried that ill lose data like i always do after a fresh install, something i forgot to back up like always :x
are all my settings in my home dir? bookmarks and program settings etc?
